meanings.sent1: The baby's slobbery bib needed changing after mealtime.
meanings.sent2: The dog's slobbery kisses left wet marks on my cheek.
meanings.sent3: The slobbery puppy made a mess but was too cute to resist.
meanings.sent4: The slobbery window pane distorted the view outside.
meanings.sent5: The slobbery slime trail on the floor was a clear sign of the snail's presence.

meanings.definition: Characterized by excessive drooling or dribbling
meanings.sent1: The Saint Bernard's slobbery mouth dripped water everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The slobbery toddler left a trail of drool on the carpet.
meanings.sent3: The slobbery fountain in the park was a hit with the kids on hot days.
meanings.sent4: The slobbery leak in the pipe caused a small flood in the basement.
meanings.sent5: The slobbery dog bowl was evidence of a thirsty pet.

meanings.sent1: The slobbery sandwich fell apart in my hands.
meanings.sent2: The slobbery handwriting on the note made it hard to read.
meanings.sent3: The slobbery art project turned out surprisingly well despite the mess.
meanings.sent4: The slobbery room looked like a tornado had passed through.
meanings.sent5: The slobbery garden was a chaotic mix of flowers and weeds.
